segments.text: I’m furious at how careless the woman is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and she’s just standing there drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she’s completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting soaked, and she’s just ignoring it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s being completely irresponsible right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are going to get hurt if they keep climbing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she even cares about what’s happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just making me so mad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone steps in before this gets any worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just unacceptable behavior from the woman.
segments.speaker: PAR
